Uses of Interface
xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates.ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy

  • Packages that use ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.cursors.mappers
    The package xxl.core.cursors.mappers provides miscellaneous implementations of mapping operators on cursors.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates provides implementations of the techniques proposed in [HHW97]: J.

    • Uses of ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy in xxl.core.cursors.mappers

      Constructors in xxl.core.cursors.mappers with parameters of type ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
      ReservoirSampler(Iterator input, int n, ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy strategy)
      Constructs a new aggregator that provides a reservoir sampling as output.

    • Uses of ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy in xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates

      Classes in xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates that implement ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ReservoirSample.AbstractStrategy
      This class provides a preimplementation of the ReservoirSamplingStrategy interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
      static class  ReservoirSample.RType
      Type R strategy computes for every object of the underlying iterator the designated position in the reservoir.
      static class  ReservoirSample.XType
      Type X strategy computes first the number of objects to skip and then the position in the reservoir for the object followed by the last one skipped.
      static class  ReservoirSample.ZType
      Type Z strategy computes first the number of objects to skip and then the position in the reservoir for the object followed by the last one skipped.
      Fields in xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates declared as ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy ReservoirSample.strategy
      strategy used for sampling
      Constructors in xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates with parameters of type ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
      ReservoirSample(int n, ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy strategy)
      Constructs a new aggregation function of type sampling.
      ReservoirSample(Number[] reservoir, ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy strategy)
      Constructs a new aggregation function of type sampling.
